DDL.statement: CREATE INDEX PH_DATE_NDX ON APP_PALLET_HISTORY (TRANSACTION_DATE)
DELETE FROM APP_MATERIAL WHERE MATERIAL = '00000001'
DELETE FROM APP_MATERIAL_LOCATION WHERE MATERIAL = '00000001'
DELETE FROM APP_MATERIAL_UOM WHERE MATERIAL = '00000001'
DELETE FROM APP_PROCESS_ORDER WHERE PROCESS_ORDER = '00000001'
DELETE FROM APP_LOCATION WHERE LOCATION_ID = 'FACTORY1'
DELETE FROM APP_LOCATION WHERE LOCATION_ID = 'WAREHOUSE1'
DELETE FROM APP_LOCATION WHERE LOCATION_ID = 'WAREHOUSE2'
DELETE FROM APP_LOCATION WHERE LOCATION_ID = 'WAREHOUSE3'
DELETE FROM APP_LOCATION WHERE LOCATION_ID = 'WAREHOUSE4'
